attributes.action: Divide England into 2 nations North/South with Manchester as a Northern capital
attributes.additional_details: Northern citizens suffer from lower life expectancy, lack of investment in education, health, skilled training, quality employment opportunities, lack of political influence and economic growth. The neglect in the aforementioned areas are at such an extent that the North and South could be viewed as separate countries already, devolution of powers from London to a Northern Parliament would better serve the interests of citizens living and working within Northern England. Evidence is everywhere!
attributes.background: The divide gives sovereign autonomy to Northern England so it can best serve the needs & interests of its citizens with both nations N&S coexisting harmoniously within one territory. The divide is required to address unfair political preference, cultural and economic differences between the two.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what powers you would like a Northern Parliament to have, or what relationship you would like it to have with the UK Parliament. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
